comments.body: this adds to the accepted formats the `datetime` validator permits, the docs added in https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/85381/files#r347187064 are not complete
we can easily override the time format, copy their regexps and that way stop adding ISO8601LocalTime.

The validation code path does not use the `ISO8601LocalTime` regex, but only the one for rfc3339. This means that the `datetime` format in our API rejects e.g. timezone-less `2006-01-02T15:04:05`, but also the mille and micro second variant. I don't know why the upstream project added that support to their unmarshaller.
With that, I think this PR is fine.

can you open a followup issue to track the override/cleanup work we discussed:
* pinning the named/supported validators we currently have
* forking/extracting the openapi validator
